page.title: 15LEISURE IN HUNTINGDON.
page.content: In Huntingdon there are many things to do in our spare time.Young people can attend the Youth Club where they can play snooker,darts and table tennis. They can also listen to music and dance.Girls from the ages of seven and sixteen can attend either the Brownies or the Guides and the boys can go to Cubs or Scouts.There is also a swimming club,short tennis and tennis club at the local Comprehensive school. Football is very popular too and children are able to join one of the many teams who play on Sunday's. There is also a ballet class and gymnastic club.
